translation.about: Full Stack developer with a strong focus on front-end web development, UX/UI design and accessibility. Passionate about art in all its forms: From painting, architecture, music to video games and graphic design. I am a proactive and passionate worker. I enjoy teamwork and stand out for my organization and meticulousness, ensuring that the code I create is clean and efficient. I have a strong commitment to accessibility, innovation and constant improvement. I'm looking to grow in development projects, contributing my skills and motivation.
translation.contact1: I would love to tell you more about myself
translation.contact2: Of course I want to see a photo of your pet!
translation.contact3: I always have a board game ready to go
translation.contact4: I don't know how my plants are still alive either
translation.contact5: What series are you watching? No spoilers!
translation.project1About: Game that allows using the mouse or the keyboard to simulate the sounds of a drum set.
translation.project2About: Web where people who need a digital service can ask other users for help. For example: translate a text, edit a photo, review a document, etc. Only needs that can be made through a digital file.
